attributes.action: Make all food Outlets provide lacto free products
attributes.additional_details:
Stand up for the Lactose Intolerant people of the UK.

We the undersigned; request that the relevant department(s) introduce a law for all food outlets to accommodate Lactose Intolerant customers; ie. supply Soy Milk, Non dairy butter, Non dairy Cheese and to display Dairy based dishes on the menu.
